about_the_game:
Real-Time Combat System

  • Engage in thrilling PvE and high-stakes full loot PvP combat.
  • Execute tactical maneuvers with abilities like block, parry, and dash.
  • Master the fine art of war and make every second count in visceral real-time battles.

Player-Driven Economy

  • The economy of the game is dictated by the players.
  • Gather a wide range of resources from the world around you.
  • Use your crafting skills to create powerful gear.
  • Trade crafted items in the market to profit or bolster your arsenal.

One Massive Server

  • The entire game world exists on one enormous server.
  • Experience seamless interaction with players from around the globe.
  • Form alliances and establish your dominion, or wander as a lone wolf.

Immersive Open World

  • Explore a vast, perilous world teeming with danger and opportunity.
  • Every corner of the map holds potential resources or threats.
  • Your actions can have far-reaching consequences, affecting the balance of power and the state of the economy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 64bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Swords and Shotguns is a Sandbox Survival MMORPG, combining elements of PvE and full loot PvP with intense real-time combat. Gather resources, craft power gear, and shape the player-driven economy. The entire world is a massive big server.
